data.text:
Front Office Sports’ Post

375,256 followers

1y

Kyle Korver spent 5 years with the Atlanta Hawks — where he was an All-Star in 2015. In July, he rejoined the team as Director of Player Affairs and Development. Today, per ESPN, the Hawks are promoting Korver to Assistant GM.
